alert.note: Alert for Bears Paw Mountains and Southern Blaine; Big Belt, Bridger and Castle Mountains; Canyon Ferry Area; Fergus County below 4500ft; Judith Basin County and Judith Gap; Little Belt and Highwood Mountains; Meagher County Valleys; Northern Blaine County; Snowy and Judith Mountains (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued November 05 at 8:08AM MDT by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: ...Very gusty rain showers will impact portions of east central Broadwater, Meagher, Judith Basin, Fergus, southeastern Blaine, northeastern Gallatin and southeastern Cascade Counties through 900 AM MDT... At 806 AM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking band of rain and very strong winds along a line extending from 12 miles southwest of Dodson to near Townsend. Movement was east at 55 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts in excess of 55 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs, power lines, and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Lewistown, Townsend, White Sulphur Springs, Stanford, Denton, Hobson, Winifred, Moore, Grass Range, Hays, Roy, Fergus, Windham, Forestgrove, Sapphire Village, Lodge Pole, Utica, Danvers, Valentine and Checkerboard. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
